meanings.definition: A type of flowering plant with small purple, pink, or white flowers.
meanings.sent1: In the garden, the aubretias added a splash of color with their delicate blooms.
meanings.sent2: I planted a row of aubretias along the edge of the flower bed.
meanings.sent3: The aubretias seemed to dance in the breeze, showing off their pretty petals.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and cheerful as a bunch of aubretias in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The aubretias swayed gently in the sunlight, like a floral orchestra playing a soft melody.
